verses.verse: Moreover <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%>, ye <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H238>men<s%>; And give ear unto <S%H3045>me<s%>, ye that have knowledge.
For the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H974>trieth<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>, As the <S%H2441>palate<s%> <S%H2938>tasteth<s%> <S%H398>food<s%>.
Let us <S%H977>choose<s%> for us that which is <S%H4941>right<s%>: Let us <S%H3045>know<s%> among ourselves what is <S%H2896>good<s%>.
For <S%H347>Job<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H6663>righteous<s%>, And <S%H410>God<s%> hath taken <S%H5493>away<s%> my <S%H4941>right<s%>:
Notwithstanding my <S%H4941>right<s%> I am accounted a <S%H3576>liar<s%>; My <S%H2671>wound<s%> is <S%H605>incurable<s%>, though I am without <S%H6588>transgression<s%>.
What <S%H1397>man<s%> is like <S%H347>Job<s%>, Who drinketh <S%H8354>up<s%> <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%>,
Who <S%H732>goeth<s%> in <S%H2274>company<s%> with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, And <S%H3212>walketh<s%> with <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>?
For he hath <S%H559>said<s%>, It <S%H5532>profiteth<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> nothing That he should <S%H7521>delight<s%> himself with <S%H430>God<s%>.

Therefore <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H582>me<s%>, ye men of <S%H3824>understanding<s%>: Far be <S%H2486>it<s%> from <S%H410>God<s%>, that he should do <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, And from the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, that he should commit <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>.
For the <S%H6467>work<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> will he <S%H7999>render<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, And cause every man to <S%H4672>find<s%> according to his <S%H734>ways<s%>.
Yea <S%H551><s%>, of a surety, <S%H410>God<s%> will not do <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>, Neither will the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
Who gave him a <S%H6485>charge<s%> over the <S%H776>earth<s%>? Or who hath <S%H7760>disposed<s%> the whole <S%H8398>world<s%>?
If he <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> upon <S%H622>himself<s%>, If he gather unto himself his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and his <S%H5397>breath<s%>;
All <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H1478>perish<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, And <S%H120>man<s%> shall turn <S%H7725>again<s%> unto <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
If now thou hast <S%H998>understanding<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H238>this<s%>: Hearken to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H4405>words<s%>.
Shall even one that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H2280>govern<s%>? And wilt thou <S%H7561>condemn<s%> him that is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and <S%H3524>mighty<s%>?â€”
Him that <S%H559>saith<s%> to a <S%H4428>king<s%>, Thou art <S%H7563>vile<s%>, Or to <S%H5081>nobles<s%>, Ye are <S%H1100>wicked<s%>;

That <S%H5375>respecteth<s%> not the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of <S%H8269>princes<s%>, Nor <S%H5234>regardeth<s%> the <S%H7771>rich<s%> more <S%H6440>than<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>; For they all are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

In a <S%H7281>moment<s%> they <S%H4191>die<s%>, even at <S%H2676>midnight<s%>; The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1607>shaken<s%> and pass <S%H5674>away<s%>, And the <S%H47>mighty<s%> are taken <S%H5674>away<s%> without <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
For his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are upon the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, And he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> all his <S%H6806>goings<s%>.
There is no <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, nor thick <S%H6757>gloom<s%>, Where the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> may hide <S%H5641>themselves<s%>.
For he needeth not <S%H7760>further<s%> to consider a <S%H376>man<s%>, That he should <S%H1980>go<s%> before <S%H410>God<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
He breaketh in <S%H7489>pieces<s%> mighty <S%H3524>men<s%> in ways past <S%H2714>finding<s%> <S%H5975>out<s%>, And setteth others in their <S%H312>stead<s%>.
Therefore he taketh <S%H5234>knowledge<s%> of their <S%H4566>works<s%>; And he <S%H2015>overturneth<s%> them in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, so that they are <S%H1792>destroyed<s%>.
He <S%H5606>striketh<s%> them <S%H8478>as<s%> wicked <S%H7563>men<s%> In the <S%H4725>open<s%> sight of <S%H7200>others<s%>;
Because they turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> from following <S%H310>him<s%>, And would not have <S%H7919>regard<s%> in any of his <S%H1870>ways<s%>:
So that they caused the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H8085>him<s%>, And he heard the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.

When he giveth <S%H8252>quietness<s%>, who then can <S%H7561>condemn<s%>? And when he <S%H5641>hideth<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, who then can <S%H7789>behold<s%> <S%H1471>him<s%>? Alike whether it be done unto a nation, or unto <S%H3162>a<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>:
That the <S%H120>godless<s%> man <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H4170>not<s%>, That there be none to ensnare the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
For hath any <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H2254>chastisement<s%>, I will not offend any more:
That which I <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H1107>not<s%> <S%H3384>teach<s%> thou <S%H6466>me<s%>: If I have done <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, I will do it no <S%H3254>more<s%>?
Shall his <S%H7999>recompense<s%> be as thou <S%H3588>wilt<s%>, that thou refusest <S%H977>it<s%>? For thou must choose, and not <S%H1696>I<s%>: Therefore speak what thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>.
Men <S%H582><s%> of <S%H3824>understanding<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H2450>me<s%>, Yea, every wise <S%H1397>man<s%> that heareth <S%H8085>me<s%>:
220 <S%H347><s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, And his <S%H1697>words<s%> are without <S%H7919>wisdom<s%>.
Would <S%H15><s%> that <S%H347>Job<s%> were <S%H974>tried<s%> unto the <S%H5331>end<s%>, Because of his <S%H8666>answering<s%> like <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.
For he <S%H3254>addeth<s%> <S%H6588>rebellion<s%> unto his <S%H2403>sin<s%>; He <S%H5606>clappeth<s%> his hands among <S%H7235>us<s%>, And multiplieth his <S%H561>words<s%> against <S%H410>God<s%>.
